FileSystemDirList1

This component is used to create and remove directories on the host device. A directory is created with the path specified by the parameter Directory when the input event [In]create fires. The path specified by the parameter Directory is overridden by the data input [In]path. If the directory was successfully created then the input event [Out]created is triggered else [Out]error is triggered.

A directory is removed at the path specified the by parameter Directory when the input event [In]remove fires. The path specified by the parameter Directory is overridden by the data input [In]path. If the directory was successfully removed then the input event [Out]removed is triggered else [Out]error is triggered. An error is produced if there is no directory at the path specified or if the directory could not be removed. The EmptyOnly parameter is a Boolean value that specifies if the directory must be empty before it can be successfully removed.

Ports

  • [In] create:

    Input event, creates the directory.

  • [In] path:

    Data input, the path of the directory to create or remove.

  • [Out] created:

    Output event, triggered when the directory is successfully created.

  • [Out] error:

    Output event, triggered when the directory fails to be created.

  • [In] remove:

    Input event, removes the directory.

  • [Out] removed:

    Output event, triggered when the directory is successfully removed.

  • [Out] error:

    Output event, triggered when the directory fails to be removed.

Parameters

  • Directory:

    The path of the directory to create or remove.

    Data Type:

    S,

    Min Value:

    Media Directory,

    Max Value:

    None,

    Default Value:

    None

  • EmptyOnly:

    Boolean value to indicate whether the directory must be empty before it is removed.

    Data Type:

    B,

    Min Value:

    0,

    Max Value:

    1,

    Default Value:

    1

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
